Headline: Brand-first GTM Architect I Fractional CMO I Entrepreneur I Scaled-up companies from 0 to 1
Comment:
Absolutely agree. Loyalty isn‚Äôt dead‚Äîit‚Äôs just evolved.

People are not loyal to brands anymore because brands stopped being loyal to them.

For years, many brands focused more on acquisition than relationships. But today‚Äôs customer is smarter, more connected, and spoilt for choice. Loyalty now comes from how you make them feel, not just what you sell.

If you‚Äôre not solving real problems, making their lives easier, or showing up with consistency and care‚Äîthey‚Äôll move on.

Loyalty is no longer bought. It‚Äôs earned‚Äîevery single day.
